meanings.sent1: The shark's toothy grin was intimidating.
meanings.sent2: The alligator's toothy mouth snapped shut.
meanings.sent3: The toothy rabbit costume at the party was a hit.
meanings.sent4: The old house had a toothy staircase leading to the attic.
meanings.sent5: The toothy smile of the baby brightened the room.

meanings.sent1: The wolf's toothy snarl warned the intruders.
meanings.sent2: The horse's toothy grin charmed the visitors.
meanings.sent3: The toothy pumpkin carving won first prize.
meanings.sent4: The mountain range had a toothy outline against the sky.
meanings.sent5: The toothy grin of the actor lit up the stage.

meanings.definition: A smile showing a lot of teeth.
meanings.sent1: Her toothy smile brightened everyone's day.
meanings.sent2: The comedian's toothy grin made the audience laugh.
meanings.sent3: The toothy sun in the children's drawing was adorable.
meanings.sent4: The toothy crescent moon hung low in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The toothy mascot at the game cheered up the crowd.
